title: Switzerland Ski Escape with Daily Drinks & Four-Course Dining Experience
description:
For après-ski scenes, powder-white slopes and gently rolling Alpine forest, moments from Jakobshorn Sky Gondola and the centre of Davos Platz, look no further than Grischa - DAS Hotel Davos. Switzerland’s largest premier skiing retreat and currently the #1 hotel in Davos Platz on TripAdvisor, this stylish hotel delivers a quintessential Switzerland experience at the foot of the 2,590m Jakobshorn Mountain.

Stay in European elegance in a hotel that boasts its very own cigar lounge and wine cellar, with decadent inclusions such as a welcome drink per adult on arrival, daily buffet breakfast and a one-time four-course à la carte dining experience at Monta Grill Restaurant. For added après ski indulgence, enjoy one daily glass of wine or beer in the cosy Pulsa Bar & Lounge.

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to the Alpine Junior Suite for two adults and up to two children (aged 11 years and under). See Fine Print for details.

**Travelling to Europe?** [Browse our Europe Collection](https://luxuryescapes.com/au/destinations/europe).
